content: Here is a list of provisional declaration times for the elections taking place on Thursday in England, with results expected from the early hours on Friday.

The list contains all 230 local authorities with elections, and is arranged alphabetically and chronologically. Timings of estimated results for the four mayoral elections in England are also included.Some timings are based on previous elections, and all times are subject to change. They all relate to Friday.COUNCILS ALPHABETICAL1 Amber Valley 19:00 2 Arun 16:30 3 Ashfield 05:30 4 Ashford 16:00 5 Babergh 16:00 6 Barnsley 15:00 7 Basildon 01:30 8 Basingstoke & Deane 17:00 9
